Springboro Ordinances

Codified Ordinances of Springboro, Ohio

Download this project as a .zip file Download this project as a tar.gz file

CHAPTER 1020 Streets

1020.01Conditions precedent to improving streets. 1020.02Maintenance of State highways. 1020.03Snow and ice control policy for unaccepted streets.

CROSS REFERENCES

Power to establish and care for streets - see Ohio R.C. 715.19, 717.01, 723.01

Change of name, vacating and narrowing streets - see Ohio R.C. 723.04 et seq.

Surface treatment - see Ohio R.C. 723.23, 723.31

Changing established grade - see Ohio R.C. 727.32

Obstruction of streets - see TRAF. 1026.01

Subdivision design standards - see P. & Z. 1248.02
